panels.description: The total volume of ingested files and links available as the knowledge base for the RAG system
panels.title: Ingested Files & Links

panels.description: The current number of files and links that are in the process of being ingested.
panels.title: In-Process

panels.description: This data indicates the total number of chunks extracted from ingested files and links.
panels.title: Total Chunks

panels.description: The number of files and links that Guardrails has blocked due to policy violations or unacceptable content.
panels.title: Blocked

panels.description: The number of files and links that have encountered error statuses.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: The number of files and links that have been marked for deletion and are undergoing the removal process.
panels.title: Marked for Deletion

panels.description: The total number of files and links tracked by the EDP throughout their entire lifecycle, starting from uploading and being successfully ingested, or encountering errors, being blocked, or marked for deletion until they are fully removed.
panels.title: Total Number of Files & Links

panels.description:
Tracks Celery task states: 
 - 'Active Tasks' are tasks currently being processed
 - 'Reserved Tasks' are tasks that have been prefetched by the worker and are waiting to be executed
 - 'Scheduled Tasks' are tasks reserved by the worker with an eta or countdown argument set
panels.title: Celery Tasks Status Overview

panels.description: This data indicates the total number of chunks extracted from ingested files and links.
panels.title: Total Number of Chunks for Files & Links

panels.description: The count of files and links that encountered error statuses.
panels.title: Error Status

panels.description: The count of files and links that Guardrails has blocked due to policy violations or unacceptable content.
panels.title: Blocked Status

panels.description: Displays the flow of files through various stages from upload to ingestion.
panels.title: Files Stage Tracker

panels.description: Displays the flow of links through various stages from upload to ingestion.
panels.title: Links Stage Tracker
